price: 85. Y la sentencia (del castigo) caerá sobre ellos por haber sido injustos (al negar la verdad), y no podrán pronunciar (ninguna excusa).
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
